# CLI-Engine

A very simple game engine designed to run in the terminal. It works using tables.

## Example Usage

```python
import cliEngine

# Initialize the game with a 9x9 board
game = cliEngine.Game(9, 9)  # Width and Height.
game.printBoard()  # Prints the board.
```
